sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT(G.GIS_ASSETS_CD,'-'),G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) AS GIS_ASSETS_TOT_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_NM, G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM, G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,' ') || NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,' ') || NVL2(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,'-',' ') || NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,' ') AS GIS_ASSETS_LNM_DISPLAY, G.GIS_ASSETS_AR, O.OLNLP, G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN, G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, G.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, G.GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, G.GIS_ASSETS_RM, G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD, G.GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, G.DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR, G.DRW_LST_SEQ, G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT, G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD, G.ERP_ASSETS_NO, G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ, G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN, G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN, G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD, TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, G.ERP_ASSETS_CLS FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM OLNLP_F WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN BEGIN_DT AND END_DT) O ON G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=O.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD =O.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD =O.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #gisAssetsLnm#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #gisAssetsLnmSub#
ORDER BY GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC )Z ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE 1 = 1
AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd#
AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#
AND GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #gisAssetsLnm#
AND GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #gisAssetsLnmSub#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, OLNLP_SEQ, OLNLP, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BEGIN_DT),'YYYY-MM-DD') BEGIN_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DT),'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT FROM OLNLP_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# ORDER BY BEGIN_DT DESC )Z ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM OLNLP_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OLNLP_F ( GIS_ASSETS_CD , GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , OLNLP_SEQ , OLNLP , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , BEGIN_DT , END_DT ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsCd# , #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# , #gisAssetsSubCd# , (SELECT LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(OLNLP_SEQ),'00'))+1),2,'0') FROM OLNLP_F) , #olnlp# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE , TO_DATE(#beginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#endDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )

INSERT INTO BUPJUNGDONG_OLNLP_F ( OLNLP_APPLC_YEAR, BEGIN_DT, END_DT, OLNLP, BUPJUNGDONG_CD, LNM, MT ) VALUES ( #olnlpApplcYear#, TO_DATE(#beginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#endDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #olnlp#, #bupjungdongCd#, #lnm#, #mt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OLNLP_F SET OLNLP = #olnlp#, UPD_USR = #updUsr#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE, BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#beginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), END_DT = TO_DATE(#endDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND OLNLP_SEQ = #olnlpSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM OLNLP_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND OLNLP_SEQ = #olnlpSeq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OLNLP_F ( GIS_ASSETS_CD , GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , OLNLP_SEQ , OLNLP , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , BEGIN_DT , END_DT ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsCd# , #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# , #gisAssetsSubCd# , (SELECT LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(OLNLP_SEQ),'00'))+1),2,'0') FROM OLNLP_F) , #olnlp# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE , TO_DATE(#beginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#endDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE OLNLP_F SET
OLNLP = #olnlp#,
UPD_USR = #updUsr#,
BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#beginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
END_DT = TO_DATE(#endDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND OLNLP_SEQ = #olnlpSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM OLNLP_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND OLNLP_SEQ = #olnlpSeq#
